call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - September 12th 2024

decisions.decision: Sigmanauts will adopt and abide by the voted moderation policy across all Sigmanauts channels
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To ensure healthier and more productive conversations in community channels
decisions.quote: Once that's passed, that'll be pinned in the Sigmanauts channels, and we will abide by it. So that means any channel that you're in that the Sigmanauts own, essentially, you will need to abide by those rules

commitments.commitment: Run next DevNet in a few days for Sigma 6.0
commitments.quote: So I think to run next DevNet in a few days

commitments.commitment: Start with DevNet first for sub-blocks, then try public testnet
commitments.quote: it makes sense to start with DevNet first and then, yeah, we can try software out on the public testnet

commitments.commitment: Soft launch of Dexy with contracts deployed one by one
commitments.quote: in like weeks, we will have a soft launch, right? So they're deploying contracts one by one

commitments.commitment: Meeting with student body to explain DAO and blockchain usage
commitments.quote: I have a meeting next week with the student body for that group and where I explain everything and how it works

open_questions.question: Whether ChainCash will be used by students for college environment
open_questions.context: Documentation for API methods was completed but usage uncertain

open_questions.question: Timeline for Ethereum bridge completion on Rosen
open_questions.context: Screenshots showed progress but no clear timeline provided

open_questions.question: How Rosen will handle token swapping with singletons
open_questions.context: Could be a big market but would be very challenging to implement

reversals_or_updates.previous: Running storage rent collection on original Sigmanauts mining pool
reversals_or_updates.update: Moving all hash to Mark's new server mining pool
reversals_or_updates.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Full watcher update released for Rosen with no config changes required
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Storage rent on average is 0.14 ERG for boxes older than four years
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Storage rent collection found four or five blocks in two days of mainnet testing
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Cornell DAO will start with $50,000 in Cornell USD tokens
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts moderation policy vote has about three more days remaining
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: 30,000 more ERG were bridged to Cardano blockchain
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: ERG lending APY dropped from 5% to 3.2% on DuckPools
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Mining pool now runs on $16/month Hetzner server with four cores and eight gigs of RAM
key_facts.speaker: qx()
